# Today

---


<!-- .slide: data-background="../img/background/why.jpg" -->
## You are combining
# HPA (v2) with Prometheus

---


<!-- .slide: data-background="../img/background/why.jpg" -->
## ... and creating
# custom HPA formulas

---

```
apiVersion: autoscaling/v2beta1
kind: HorizontalPodAutoscaler
metadata:
  name: go-demo-5
spec:
  ...
  minReplicas: 3
  maxReplicas: 10
  metrics:
  - type: Object
    object:
      metricName: http_req_per_second_per_replica
      target:
        kind: Ingress
        name: go-demo-5
      targetValue: 50m
```
